entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
